meanings.sent1: The rock was insensible to the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent2: She was insensible to the pain in her arm after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The insensible teddy bear didn't flinch when tickled.
meanings.sent4: His heart, insensible to love, remained cold and distant.
meanings.sent5: The insensible robot could not appreciate the beauty of nature.

meanings.sent1: After the accident, he lay insensible on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The patient remained insensible throughout the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The insensible cat slept deeply, dreaming of chasing mice.
meanings.sent4: The insensible state of the city was a reflection of its chaotic nature.
meanings.sent5: The insensible child napped peacefully, unaware of the world around.

meanings.sent1: His fingers, insensible from the cold, struggled to grasp the pen.
meanings.sent2: The numbness left her foot insensible to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The insensible tree stood still, unaffected by the wind.
meanings.sent4: In the insensible darkness, she fumbled for the light switch.
meanings.sent5: The insensible ghost passed through walls without feeling a thing.
